title: High skillcap champions
body: Who are some high skillcap champions 3150 IP and less? I've tried figuring this out myself but most forum archive discussions are outdated and I can't make myself a list. I guess anivia is one? I think ?

replies.body:
for 1350 theres IMO: janna, twisted fate and evelynn

and for 3150 theres anivia, shaco, twitch and karthus.
As far as the hardest champs in the group to **use effectively**  I'd say that would go to shaco and twitch.

If you want further insight into any of their play-styles just ask.
How is twitch high skill cap exactly?

hes all about positioning and has one of the worst laning phases in the game. Just about every other adc can out poke him and combined with their support, completely zone him during the laning phase(if they know how).
Because of this he's highly support reliant even if the twitch is decent.
As for positioning, you get one chance to get it right in a fight with ur q, fuck it up and ur done for. All u got is flash to try and re position. Because of this you need a reasonable knowledge to know where you want to be using your q to get to before a fight breaks out.

If the above things are dealt with twitch becomes a monster though. Love assassinating people with my core items :P makes me feel like ekko

I think you mistake skill cap, with skill floor.

Also bad laning =/= high skill cap.

450IP: no one is "high skill cap" really. Easy champs used to learn the game.
1350IP: {{champion:4}} and {{champion:26}}  I guess... i mean, for a new person they would be hard but not really hard if you played for a while.
3150IP: {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:35}}{{champion:27}} . Again, not really hard. Maybe for newer people.

According to Riot the highest skill capped champions in the game are: {{champion:34}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:157}}

http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/forum/general/all-new-difficulty-levels-for-season-5-in-order-32028

The problem being that most 3150 champs aren't that high a skill cap, Anivia, Arguably Gragas, maybe Kassadin since all her nerfs, some people would debate Shaco, otherwise there isn't really any high Skill Cap champions in that bracket.
